caption.p: Cloning and purification of 3CL pro protein. (A) 1% agarose gel showing the bands of the double digested plasmid with vector 5.4 kb and insert around 918 bases (L2), the cloned plasmid showing band at 6.4 kb (L3). (B) SDS‐PAGE on 12% acrylamide gel, depicting homogenous protein at ~34 kDa (C) The western blot of purified 3CL pro using anti‐His antibody with mol wt ~34 kDa (L2) [Colour figure can be viewed at wileyonlinelibrary.com]
